snippet: A world premiere from the choreographer Robert Moses is among the highlights of the Alvin Ailey Dance Theater’s two-week engagement at Lincoln Center.
abstract: A world premiere from the choreographer Robert Moses is among the highlights of the Alvin Ailey Dance Theater’s two-week engagement at Lincoln Center.

headline.main: Alvin Ailey to Bring New Work to Koch Theater
headline.print_headline: A Moses Premiere Is Part of Ailey Lineup
